snippet: Norway’s Parliament voted overwhelmingly on Friday to conscript women into its armed forces, becoming the first European and first NATO country to make military service compulsory for both men and women.
abstract: Norway's Parliament votes overwhelmingly to conscript women into its armed forces, becoming the first European and first NATO country to make military service compulsory for both men and women.
lead_paragraph: Norway’s Parliament voted overwhelmingly on Friday to conscript women into its armed forces, becoming the first European and first NATO country to make military service compulsory for both men and women.

headline.main: A Vote to Draft Women in Norway
headline.print_headline: Norway: A Vote to Draft Women
